# [Interview #981: JordanCon 2013 - Q&A with Maria, Entry #14](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=981#14)

#### Terez

Is the Bowl of the Winds found in Ebou Dar the same one that was lost by the Sea Folk?

#### Maria Simons

I don't know.
